articles.author: Sumanti Sen
articles.title: Caitlin Clark, WNBA players wear 'Pay Us What You Owe Us' T-shirts at All‑Star warm-ups: How much do they make? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: WNBA players gathered in Indianapolis for the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game warm-ups wearing T-shirts that read, "Pay Us What You Owe Us."
articles.content: Caitlin Clark and other WNBA players in the league gathered in Indianapolis for the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game warm-ups wearing T-shirts that read, "Pay Us What You Owe Us." A video of the players sport… [+4169 chars]
